markdown:
| icon           = poe2 glove_03 icon.png
| description    = Hailing from the slums of Nekataka, the master pickpocket Rokowa made her humble fortune by cutting purse strings and picking pockets. Her talent for liberating wealth from those who seemed so incapable of keeping it was due in part to these enchanted gloves. When worn, they seem hardly there - like a second skin. When dipped into a pocket or satchel, one's fingertips practically filch of their own accord.
